nodes.text: Darth Ikoral's fleet embarked on an expedition in search of other Sith pureblood colonies during the reign of the reconstituted Sith Empire. A strong believer in the purity of Sith blood, Darth Ikoral was given permission from the Dark Council to set off with his fleet. Ikoral's fleet went missing and the Sith Lord was presumed dead by the Sith, although Ikoral later returned and attacked both the Empire and the Galactic Republic with his flagship, the Harrower-class dreadnought Red Reaper.
